Title: Relates to campaign contributions by entities doing business with the city of New York pursuant to a retainer agreement or on a contingency basis
Summary: Provides that no contracts for services with the city of New York which are awarded on a contingency basis or through a retainer agreement shall be excluded from the definition of doing business with the city for purposes of campaign finance limitations for matching contributions.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-702, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to campaign contribution limitations for entities doing business with the city under the city campaign finance act
